overview: From the manger scene to the setting of Christ's baptism to the site of Christ's crucifixion and resurrection, watch Mark Mabry recreate the Savior's most awe-inspiring moments as if you were there witnessing the events first-hand. Hear powerful testimony and life-changing experiences from Mabry and many others who participated. Prepare to be spiritually moved. Prepare to come unto Christ.
title: Reflections of Christ
